name: Dot (itch) (shinseyy)
description:
Dot is a shooter game where on start of every level you have to collect controls necessary to play. Try to get out of oneiric world dreamed up in Dot's head. Try different weapons and playstyles by managing your controlls! Upgrade your character and buy new weapons!

Dot is having nightmares every night. One day he decides to put pistol under his pillow. This time he wakes up in nightmare but he is armed. Can he retrieve his peacful dreams?

Controls:

  • WASD - moving around
  • Space - healing
  • Left Mouse Button - first type shooting
  • Right Mouse Button - second type shooting
  • Middle Mouse Button - weapon changing

On start of a level you have 10 seconds to collect as many controlls as you can. When the time ends, you will have to beat entire level with controls you gathered.

Game was made for GMTK 2020 Game Jam

Only few sounds weren't made by me.
